name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2023 - Round 1
summary:
Welcome to Round 1 of the 2023 SRB2 Official Level Design Collab! The OLDC is a celebration of all the map creators in our community. This time around, it is also the introduction of UDMF to the event, unlocking unique new level creation possibilities.

Single Player​:
- Spleenik The Game - dashdahog
- Rigonemetis 33 - InferNOr
- The Cyber Grind - BuggieTheBug
- HillTop Fort Zone - mammothmogulfan22
- Network Terminal Zone - wat_newby3
- Tectonic Bluffs Zone - TrustyGun
- Twilight Hill Zone - csean07 ☆Kori☆
- Blue Mountain Zone - Avalice
- Veggie Keeps Zone - Jisk
- High Jump Hijinx Zone - glaber
- Robotropolis Tunnels Zone - Rogerregorroger
- Tofu Thalweg Zone - RoyKirbs
- Confined Ravine Zone - Vixuzen

- Scarlet Canyon Zone - NordVPN & NeonSRB2
- Scrap Brain Zone - CILC
- Final Zone - CILC
- Soulside Dungeon Zone - Zaxel Katsugyo
- Sandy Night Zone - TheLastKitchenGun
- Hoehle denk ich - Bewinus

- Radiant Reverie Zone - Princess Plushima

- Birabuto Sands Zone - Pallaris
- Blossom Breeze Zone - Spiritsune & Othius

- Algae Railway Zone - JABSphere94

Circuit​:
